purpleculture_pinyin:
lǔ
surname Lu; Lu, ancient state of China 鲁国 ; Lu, short name for Shandong 山东 ; (bound form) crass; stupid; rude; (used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
фамилия Лу; Лу, древнее государство Китая 鲁国; Лу, сокращенное имя Шаньдун 山东; (переплетенная форма) грубая; глупый; грубый; (используется для обозначения звуков «ру», «лу» и т. д. в заимствованных словах)

heisig_chinese_memo: Lucy Lu is a famous Chinese American actress who must have eaten a lot of healthy fish and stayed out of the sun to look that good.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: you eat fish (魚) in the sun (日) in Russia
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A man looks up, sees a fish flying over the sun, points and says 'luuuuuuuuuuuu.... I mean looooooooooook.....'.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscription " Lu " from " mouth " from " fish ", " fish " is also a musical note, which means that fish is delicious. The original meaning is delicious. When it comes to saying " Lu " originally has a beautiful meaning, " mouth " may be in the shape of a vessel, as indicated by the fish in the vessel (Yu Shengwu, Shen Pei). Hu Dianxian and Yao Xiaosui believe that " kou " is just a sign of differentiation, and the character " Lu " is derived from the form of " fish " plus " kou ".

In the later period, inscriptions were added to the " mouth ", and the error became " Gan ". Since the tail of the fish is connected to the " mouth ", the Xiaozhuan changed from " fish " to " white ".

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the place name, "Compilation" 9979: "Lu Shou Millet [year]", which means that Lu is a good adult with a good harvest of millet. It also expresses goodness, "Compilation" 10133 counters: "Giro".

Bronze inscriptions mean beauty, Shi Kuiding: "Tun (pure) Lu, Lu Ling (ming)", " pure " means thick and big. The first word " Lu " extends from beauty to mean blessing, and is similar to "嘏" It is a cognate word. The second " Lu " means beautiful and beautiful, and the whole sentence means great blessing and good fate. Bo Jiangding: "Success to the emperor Luxiu" means accepting the beautiful shade of the emperor. Also used as a place name, country name.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period express goodness. "Imperial Gate" Jane 4: "The king can inherit the fate of heaven", which means that the king of Zhou can inherit the fate of heaven. Also used as the name of the country, "Tsinghua Jane II. "Relationship" Jane 70-71: "Qi Qinggong encircles Lu, Lu Zang and Sun Xulu Jin ask for help. Ju Zhike rate (teacher) to save Lu." "Guodian Jane. "The Lord Lu Mu Asks Zisi" Jane 1: "The Lord Lu Mu faint (asked) Yu Zisi".

"Shuowen": "Lu, blunt words. Congbai, Yue Shengsheng. "The Analects" says: "Shen Ye Lu".
humanum_short_description_en: A Bronze " Lu " from " port " from the " fish ", " fish " is also sound, the fish will taste delicious intended. The original meaning is delicious.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文「魯」從「口」從「魚」，「魚」亦是聲符，會魚兒味道鮮美之意。本義是味道鮮美。一說「魯」本有美好的意思，「口」可能象器皿之形，用器皿中盛有魚來示意(于省吾、沈培)。胡澱咸、姚孝遂則認為「口」只是分化符號，「魯」字從「魚」加「口」形分化而來。

　　後期金文在「口」中加點，訛變為「甘」。由於魚尾與「口」相連，故小篆訛變為從「魚」從「白」。

　　甲骨文用作地名，《合集》9979：「魯受黍[年]」，意謂魯地得到黍子豐收的好年成。又表示美好，《合集》10133反：「吉魯」。

　　金文表示美好，史叀鼎：「屯(純)魯、魯令(命)」，「純」是厚、大之意，第一個「魯」字從美好引申有福祐的意思，與「嘏」是同源詞，第二個「魯」字表示美好的、嘉美的，全句意謂厚福、嘉命。伯姜鼎：「受天子魯休」，意謂接受天子美好的庇蔭。又用作地名、國名。

　　戰國竹簡表示美好，《清華簡一．皇門》簡4：「王用能承天之魯命」，意謂周王能繼承上天的嘉命。又用作國名，《清華簡二．繫年》簡70-71：「齊頃公圍魯，魯臧孫許蹠晉求援。駒之克率𠂤(師)救魯。」《郭店簡．魯穆公問子思》簡1：「魯穆公昏(問)於子思」。

　　《說文》：「魯，鈍詞也。从白，鮺省聲。《論語》曰：『參也魯』。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文「魯」從「口」從「魚」，「魚」亦聲，會魚兒味道鮮美之意。本義是味道鮮美。

甲金文「 魯 」從「 口 」從「 魚 」，「 魚 」亦是聲符，會魚兒味道鮮美之意。本義是味道鮮美。一說「 魯 」本有美好的意思，「 口 」可能象器皿之形，用器皿中盛有魚來示意(于省吾、沈培)。胡澱咸、姚孝遂則認為「 口 」只是分化符號，「 魯 」字從「 魚 」加「 口 」形分化而來。 後期金文在「 口 」中加點，訛變為「 甘 」。由於魚尾與「 口 」相連，故小篆訛變為從「 魚 」從「 白 」。 甲骨文用作地名，《合集》9979：「魯受黍[年]」，意謂魯地得到黍子豐收的好年成。又表示美好，《合集》10133反：「吉魯」。 金文表示美好，史叀鼎：「屯(純)魯、魯令(命)」，「 純 」是厚、大之意，第一個「 魯 」字從美好引申有福祐的意思，與「 嘏 」是同源詞，第二個「 魯 」字表示美好的、嘉美的，全句意謂厚福、嘉命。伯姜鼎：「受天子魯休」，意謂接受天子美好的庇蔭。又用作地名、國名。 戰國竹簡表示美好，《清華簡一．皇門》簡4：「王用能承天之魯命」，意謂周王能繼承上天的嘉命。又用作國名，《清華簡二．繫年》簡70-71：「齊頃公圍魯，魯臧孫許蹠晉求援。駒之克率𠂤(師)救魯。」《郭店簡．魯穆公問子思》簡1：「魯穆公昏(問)於子思」。 《說文》：「魯，鈍詞也。从白，鮺省聲。《論語》曰：『參也魯』。」

When it comes to saying " Lu" originally has a beautiful meaning, " mouth" may be in the shape of a vessel, as indicated by the fish in the vessel (Yu Shengwu, Shen Pei). Hu Dianxian and Yao Xiaosui believe that " kou" is just a sign of differentiation, and the character " Lu" is derived from the form of " fish" plus " kou". In the later period, inscriptions were added to the " mouth", and the error became " Gan". Since the tail of the fish is connected to the " mouth", the Xiaozhuan changed from " fish" to " white". The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the place name, "Compilation" 9979: "Lu Shou Millet [year]", which means that Lu is a good adult with a good harvest of millet. 魯字的基本解释

魯
lǔ
见“鲁”。

魯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǔ］
［《廣韻》郎古切，上姥，來。］
“鲁1”的繁体字。
(1)迟钝，笨拙。
(2)粗鲁，粗俗。
(3)周代诸侯国名。故地在今山东兖州东南至江苏省沛县、安徽省泗县一带。
(4)地区名。春秋时鲁国故地，秦汉以后仍沿称这些地区为鲁。
(5)今山东省的简称。
(6)姓。
[②]［lǚ］
［《集韻》兩舉切，上語，來。］
“鲁2”的繁体字。同“旅1”。
(1)陈述。
(2)旅行。参见“魯2颸”。

魯字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魯； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第26
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【正韻】郞古切【集韻】【韻會】籠五切，?音虜。【說文】鈍詞也。【論語】參也魯。【何晏註】魯，鈍也。曾子性遲鈍。又國名。【詩·魯頌譜】魯者，少昊摯之墟也。【前漢·地理志】周興，以少昊之虛曲阜封周公子伯禽爲魯侯，以爲周公主。【釋名】魯，魯鈍也。國多山水，民性樸魯也。又姓。【廣韻】伯禽之後，以國爲姓，出扶風。又複姓有魯步氏。又【集韻】旅，古作魯。註詳方部六畫。

魯字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
魯字的起名意思

暂无。

Lu
Basic explanation of words
Lu
lǔ
See "Lu".
Lu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lǔ]
["Guangyun" Lang Guqie, grandma, come. ]
Traditional characters for "鲁1".
(1) Sluggish and clumsy.
(2) Rude and vulgar.
(3) The names of the princes of the Zhou Dynasty. The old place was from the southeast of Yanzhou, Shandong to Peixian, Jiangsu, and Sixian, Anhui.
(4) The name of the area. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Lu was the homeland, and after the Qin and Han Dynasties, these areas were still called Lu.
(5) The abbreviation of today's Shandong Province.
(6) Last name.
[②] [lǚ]
["Jiyun" cut in two moves, on the words, come. ]
Traditional characters for "鲁2". Same as "Brigade 1".
(1) Statement.
(2) Travel. See "Lu 2 飔".
Lu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Hai Collection】【Fish Character Department】　Lu; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 Page 26
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yin Gu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Cage five cuts,? Sounds captive. [Said Wen] Blunt words. [The Analects] Shen Yelu. [He Yan's Note] Lu, blunt. Zeng Zi was dull. Also the name of the country. 【Poetry·Lu Song Pu】Lu Zhe, Shaohao Zhi's Ruins. [Pre-Han · Geography] Zhou Xing named the son of Zhou as Luhou by Shaohao's imaginary Qufu, and regarded it as Princess Zhou. [Release name] Lu, also dull. The country is rich in mountains and rivers, and the people are simple and simple. Another surname. [Guang Yun] After Bo Qin, he took the country as his surname and went to Fufeng. The surname is Lubu. Also 【Jiyun】travel, ancient Zuolu. Note the six paintings in the detailed square.
Lu
